name: wnba_box_score
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wnba_api.
Tool description: This API offer every basketball fan an easy way to stay on top of the latest data for all operations and players in the WNBA. It covers scores, stats, standings, and statistics.
API description: This endpoint returns the WNBA game box score data for a specified game.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the WNBA game.
